channel.title: Why
channel.description:
Why the hell are we not on bukkit yet?
I realise it might take a while to change over, but we've been saying it'll be tommorow for the past few weeks and everyday we're getting greifed even though we just moved away from spawn, and nothing's getting done about it at all..
MITB if you cannot find the time to do it then please give david at least temporary control of the host, he is extremely trust worthy and more active on the server than you (or at least in my experience, we're in different time zones so i'm not sure)
Thanks, Lon

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:10, topic:382915”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=478697.msg3505201#msg3505201 date=1298086779]
If my structures get messed up I am gonna be angry lol.
[/quote]
Notch didnt remove anything with the 1.2 update, only added. Your shit will be fine.[/quote]
Im not worried about that im talking about

Moparisthebest:

I’m going to switch, but if someone destroys your ‘protected’ chests or finds a way to use TNT on all your buildings, I can’t do anything about it, that’s what we get for using unreleased software I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

We haven’t been saying ‘tomorrow’, I said I’d probably do it sometime this week, probably the weekend, which isn’t here yet.

I’m not sure what works and what doesn’t and what plugins are ported and which aren’t. I’m going to switch, but if someone destroys your ‘protected’ chests or finds a way to use TNT on all your buildings, I can’t do anything about it, that’s what we get for using unreleased software I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Jammydee, post:3, topic:382915”]It’s released, just not completed… but the development build released works with the latest client, eliminating that problem.

Also it’s very stable and has quite a range of plugins avaliable for it and they’re all extremely easy to install…

And thanks RuneSpace ;)[/quote]
It’s not installed because dey rnt finshd

Read full topic
